events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to size mismatch and customer dissatisfaction.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's request and follow up shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your recent jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or if it is still in its original packaging?
My order number is 4593821, and the jacket is still unworn with tags attached. I want a full refund as soon as possible.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund once you send the jacket back in its original condition. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
That sounds good, thank you for your quick response. I will ship it back tomorrow using the label you provide.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that your refund has been received. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this support case now. Thank you for contacting us, and we hope to serve you again in the future.
